original_title: W.A.S.P. : Live at the Lyceum, London
overview: In September and October of 1984, within weeks of the release of their self-titled debut album, W.A.S.P. undertook their first headline World Tour, taking them to England, Europe, and Japan. This Video was shot at London's famous Lyceum on Monday, September 24, 1984, in front of a capacity crowd.
tagline: ALL THE SAVAGE, PRIMEVAL FRENZY OF W.A.S.P., HERE, CAPTURED LIVE!!!!!!
title: W.A.S.P. : Live at the Lyceum, London
